main.name: Mohammad Ariff
main.bio: Hi, Iâ€™ve been a web developer since 2014. For the last 7 years, I specialized in front-end and single page application development. Last 3 years I work mostly in React projects. I have a Bachelor of Computer Science (BCS). I worked with a lot of libs as redux-form, redux-saga, redux-query, autoprefixer, etc. I love clean and maintainable code so always use ESlint and sass-lint. Strong Linux(shell) skills, experience with AWS, Apache, Azure and payment integration (Stripe and PayPal) and many backend APIs.

testimonials.text: Thank so much for you quick and quality work!
testimonials.user: Alex Holt - Direct of Engineering, WaypointBuilding

testimonials.text: Ariff must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
